Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Handle = script.Parent Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitSound")
Sound:Play()

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") ThrowChair = Tool:WaitForChild("ThrowChair")
Equipped = false MouseDown = false
ReloadTime = 1
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local TotalMass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do GetMass(v) if v:IsA("BasePart") then TotalMass = TotalMass + v:GetMass() end end end GetMass(Parent) return TotalMass end
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Value = Player Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 2) creator_tag.Parent = Humanoid return creator_tag end
function UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) for i, v in pairs(Humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:WaitForChild("Torso") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Handle.Transparency = 0 if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and not ThrowAnim then MouseDown = true ThrowAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ThrowChair) ThrowAnim:Play() BodyAngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0) BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, (((GetTotalMass(Character) ^ 2) ^ 2) / 2), 0) BodyAngularVelocity.Parent = Torso local Velocity = 50 local MaxVelocity = 200 while MouseDown do wait(0.1) Velocity = ((Velocity < MaxVelocity and (Velocity + 5)) or (Velocity >= MaxVelocity and MaxVelocity)) end if Equipped then Tool.Enabled = false if ThrowAnim then ThrowAnim:Stop() ThrowAnim = nil end if BodyAngularVelocity and BodyAngularVelocity.Parent then BodyAngularVelocity:Destroy() end local TorsoCFrame = Torso.CFrame local Chair = Handle:Clone() Handle.Transparency = 1 Chair.Name = "Chair" Chair.CanCollide = true Chair.Locked = true Chair.Friction = 1 Chair.Elasticity = 0 Chair.Velocity = Torso.CFrame.lookVector * Velocity local ChairHit = false Chair.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and not ChairHit then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) if character and character.Parent and character ~= Character then local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso and torso.Parent then ChairHit = true local PlaySound = Chair:FindFirstChild("PlaySound") if PlaySound and PlaySound.Parent then PlaySound.Disabled = false end Chair.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) Chair.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) local ChairDistance = (Torso.Position - Chair.Position).magnitude local Damage = ((ChairDistance >= 100 and 100) or (ChairDistance <= 5 and 15) or ChairDistance) humanoid.Sit = true torso.Velocity = CFrame.new(TorsoCFrame.p, torso.Position).lookVector * 50 humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end end end) Debris:AddItem(Chair, 10) Chair.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Chair.CFrame = Handle.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.z * 2) wait(ReloadTime) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false end) end
function OnUnequipped() Equipped = false MouseDown = false Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
